
Data Archives
----------------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

Search engine can speed up our quest for certain dataset or granules, but a complete list of data products, when the total number is less than several hundred, can be very handy at times. Here they are.

The list of all PODAAC datasets
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The list of the Cloud-enabled datasets
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`This link <https://github.com/podaac/Data-Recipes/blob/main/dataset-introduction/All_POCLOUD_Data.ipynb>`_ provide a list of all PO.DAAC datasets in the cloud.
